Package renderer.scene.primitives

package renderer.scene.primitives
Geometric primitives that describe the relationships between vertices of a model.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    renderer.scene
    Data structures for describing a 3D scene to the renderer.
    renderer.scene.util
    Utility classes and methods for working with scenes and models.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Face
    A Face object has a list of integers that represent the endpoints of a closed loop of line segments.
    LineFan
    A LineFan object has n+1 integers that represent the endpoints of n line segments that radiate from a central point and another n+1 integers that represent the Color at each of those endpoints.
    LineLoop
    A LineLoop object has n integers that represent the endpoints of n contiguous line segments that form a closed loop and another n integers that represent the Color at each of those endpoints.
    Lines
    A Lines object has 2n integers that represent the endpoints of n line segments and another 2n integers that represent the Color at each of those endpoints.
    LineSegment
    A LineSegment object has four integers that represent the endpoints of the line segment and the color at each endpoint.
    LineStrip
    A LineStrip object has n+1 integers that represent the endpoints of n contiguous line segments and another n+1 integers that represent the Color at each of those endpoints.
    OrientablePrimitive
    An OrientablePrimitive is a Primitive that can be given an orientation, so it has a both a front and a back face.
    Point
    A Point object has two integers that represent the location and color of a single Vertex.
    Points
    A Points object has n integers that represent points in space and another n integers that represent the Color at each of those points.
    Primitive
    A Primitive is something that we can build geometric shapes out of (a "graphics primitive").
    Triangle
    A Triangle object has two lists of three integers each.
    TriangleFan
    A TriangleFan object has n+2 integers that represent the vertices of n triangles that radiate from a central point and another n+1 integers that represent the Color at each of those vertices.
    Triangles
    A Triangles object has 3n integers that represent the vertices of n triangles and another 3n integers that represent the Color at each of those vertices.
    TriangleStrip
    A TriangleStrip object has n+2 integers that represent the vertices of n contiguous triangles and another n+2 integers that represent the Color at each of those vertices.
